ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Anyone Out There?
ygData.msgSnippet: I have to agree -- uberguild stuff is a sad shadow of earlier gaming.  While I am glad to have my melodic charm, my Nature s Melody and all that, I find the
ygData.messageBody:
I have to agree -- uberguild stuff is a sad shadow of earlier gaming. While I am glad to have my melodic charm, my Nature's Melody and all that, I find the game just doesn't add up the same as being lvl 20 grouping with friends in LoIO. Friendships built in this game do outstrip the benefits of phat lewt.
"Cranfill, Wendy" wrote:

I'm still here but let me tell ya, this "uberguild" stuff is crap. Very
quickly ruining my enjoyment of the game.
